name: Wizard Another World
description: Wizard Another World - is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. While fighting monsters, you must collect magical artifacts that your enemies have stolen in order to restore the balance between light and darkness.

name: The Game of Sisyphus
description: Roll the boulder to the top.

name: Ghost Hunter
description: Ghost hunter is a casual game about hunting ghosts and upgrading your character. Defeat bosses, complete missions, hunt stronger ghosts and play minigames to become the true Ghost Hunter.

name: Astral Gate
description: Measure your command RPG combat skills. Astral Gate" is a combat-oriented non-field RPG in which you organize a party of your choice and challenge a 7-stage dungeon with limited resources.

name: Harbor Captain
description: Relaxing maritime game where you navigate ships into the harbor. Move ships into the correct colored docks. Avoid shipping accidents in your quest for the high score.

name: Galactic War One
description: A tower defense strategy science fiction game, in the future era, when aliens invade the solar system, players need to build various turrets to resist alien attacks and guard the Milky Way and solar system.

name: Ubermensch
description: Multiplayer movement shooter with foreboding vibes

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Desserts
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Cleaning Queens 2: Sparkling Palace
description: Wipe, scrub, brush… And enjoy sparkling clean rooms as a true Cleaning Royal!

name: Otto's Escape
description: Help Otto escape a tall tower by individually controlling his jetpack's two boosters to steer and climb your way though 20 hazard-filled floors. Just try not to run out of fuel along the way!

name: Over Islands
description: Travel from island to island, build a thriving flying city, battle air pirates aboard your zeppelin, and make important decisions as you dive into ancient temples to defeat the children of the goddess and slay their demonic armies.

name: RimWorld: Anomaly
description: Darkness stirs on the rim. Survive flesh infestations, cultist attacks, shambling undead, blood rains, invisible hunters, and other sanity-shredding perils. Capture and study entities to harness the power of the void. Conduct psychic rituals and awaken an evil machine god.

name: Gladiatory
description: Gladiatory - a Roguelite Hack & Slash RPG Game

name: 2-Bit Explorer
description: 2-Bit Explorer is a game where exploration is king. A Lovecraftian Zelda-like. Explore the labyrinth that apparently has 1 more bit than you do and find you way out of the strange reality you find yourself in. Find the one you seek...

name: Time Traveler: Escape Room VR
description: This Escape Room gives you the opportunity to embark on a journey through time, exploring the enigmatic world of the most famous characters in history, unraveling complex riddles and enigmas with clues you find along the way.

name: Lotus Lantern: Rescue Mother
description: Lotus Lantern: Rescue Mother is a rougelite top-down action game, inspired by a Chinese mythology. Players will experience the journey of Chenxiang rescuing his mother, Sanshengmu, after mastering martial arts skills from Sun Wukong.

name: Ignited in Cavern
description: In the waning years of the Northern Wei Dynasty, in the town of Dunhuang, a rumor circulates about a stone statue that bestows blessings in the mortal realm. Anu and Chu Qingqing, rushes to this place only to discover that the merchant holding the stone statue has already met his demise.

name: Golazo! 2 Deluxe - Complete Edition
description: GOLAZO! 2 Deluxe Edition is the complete version of the game which includes all updates and add-ons.

name: Unbeatable Professional Me With 100 Girlfriends!
description: I started a part-time job with my hard-working personality and earned money to buy gifts for my favorite characters.

name: Case Files: Behind Closed Doors
description: A real-time, police interrogation and detective simulator, where players must determine if suspects are lying or not, identify contradictions, and use evidence to successfully solve the case.

name: Urban Entrepreneur
description: Manage inventory, staff, prices and more while creating a monopoly!

name: Princess Chessboard
description: “Princess Chessboard” is a turn-based casual light strategy card-building game based on dice. As a warrior in the animal kingdom, please go and find the runaway princess.

name: Anomaly Collapse
description: Command a squad of adorably fierce warriors in Anomaly Collapse, a turn-based Roguelite strategy game that offers a fresh twist to an old formula! Face off against otherworldly beings and uncover the dark secrets of supernatural calamities. Immerse yourself in a story where every move counts!

name: PathBlasters
description: Run, blast, and solve your way to victory! Experience the rush of a colorful, fast-paced chase, solo or against a friend! Burst through the levels and up your score in this retro-inspired arcade setting.

name: Utakata no Uchronia
description: Fantasy otome game for Switch.

name: Infection Free Zone
description: Take charge of a group of survivors from your city. Choose your base of operations, then rebuild and readapt the buildings around you to create a self-sustaining settlement. And when the night falls - Defend the zone from the infected! Play on any city in the world, using real geographical data!

name: Revival: Recolonization
description: Set in a post-apoc version of Earth, Revival is a 4x strategy game where the world and its rules can change at key moments, creating a deep and highly replayable experience.

name: Headquarters World War II
description: Headquarters World War II is a fast-paced turn-based strategy game where your battlefield tactics are as important as your army management skills. Experience both sides of the war, battling in Europe as the USA, the UK, or Germany. Storm bunkers, occupy houses, win tank duels.

name: Labyrinth
description: Can you escape the Labyrinth, or will you succumb to the many monsters that live within?

name: Halver
description: Halve the blocks into two equal parts and solve the unique puzzles in a game with a blueprint visual style and meditative music

name: Sophia the Traveler
description: Have you ever been to Venice of Italy? If not, then please don't miss "Sophia the Traveler"! Follow this lovely heroine as she roams around the City of Water, look for objects and characters scattered all over the stunning landscapes and embrace the local culture amidst the vivid city!

name: Cat Gets Medieval
description: Adventure like you've never adventured before! You get to be a cat. Not a ordinary cat, but a cat hero! Your kingdom had a great battle with an evil army. This evil army has fled and taken your King's crown. The King needs you to fight all the evil forces and to bring back his crown to him . The only way to save the kingdom is to restore the crown to your King. You see his crown is a powerful artifact that helps the King protect the Kingdom. The King's power is waning. You must hurry!! The evil army will be back and this time they will consume your kingdom into darkness. You don't need to worry! You got this! As a Hero Cat you climb, jump, spit hairballs, scratch, and unlock powerful artifacts. The artifacts can be found if you are searching in the right places such as dungeons. It is a perilous journey ! Are you ready??

name: Goons: Legends & Mayhem
description: A frantic blend of Beat' em up, arcade hockey and RPG that plays like perpetual fights in various themed levels, opposing teams of heroes outfitted with unique abilities. Bonkers sports action like you've never seen before!

name: Die Again
description: Die Again is an innovative shooter where you kill enemies shooting and dying. If, when dying, there is an enemy nearby, you can possess their body and keep playing. But be careful, the enemies can do the same to you. Shoot to kill, die to survive, kill yourself to overcome!

name: Slapshot: Rebound
description:
Slapshot Rebound is a physics-based multiplayer game where you play an arcade style match of hockey. No shoot button, no puck glue, no RNG.

It’s up to you and your team to take control of the puck, rotate your stick to pass, shoot, outplay your opponents. Score the most goals before time runs out to win.

name: Deltatale
description: Have you ever wondered what would happen if Kris fell into the Underground instead of Frisk? Introducing DELTATALE, an alternate world where just that happens! This mod is aimed at players that have played Undertale, Deltarune, or UT Yellow and are looking for a new experience that implements lore and various upgrades from these games!

name: Mecha Domination
description:
How can humanity survive in a perilous wasteland overrun by rampaging mechanized beasts?

Our once flourishing world was annihilated by colossal mechanized beasts, causing humans to be displaced wherever these beasts roamed.

For centuries, this world has been plagued by wars and massacres, until you, a valiant commander emerges.
You will lead the survivors to capture and modify beasts, train troops, form alliances, and ultimately save humanity's last remaining enclaves.

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 11
description: Sin descripción

name: Redfir Hills
description: Time is running out: Outsmart the killer and save Zoe before it's too late! Investigate a realistic criminal case that only YOU can solve!

name: Forsaken Compound
description: Forsaken Compound is a limit-removing E1 replacement wad for Doom 1. There's a mix of action/slaughtery gameplay and more simple, atmosphere-oriented parts that require some thinking, overall intended to be more difficult than normal Knee Deep in the Dead-style mapping, as well as more visually distinct and varied than that episode. Texturing is all done from the IWAD with an excellent custom palette by Dir, and some sound replacements from Doom 64 and Doom 3.

name: Embraced
description: Embraced is small set of 3 maps focusing on combat puzzle and slaughter(4th map progress stopper). Adding again to the green techbase crowd but this time with a lot of wood textures!

name: Fortias Saga
description:
Welcome to Fortias continent - the land of magic and mythical creatures.

In the 730th year according to the Eradel calendar, a war broke out between the human alliance and the dark forces across the land. To save humanity, you along with other heroes embark on an adventure through amazing worlds, explore dungeon, fight against hordes of monsters and the dark forces. Collect magical resources to enhance the power of your team and strengthen human defence by upgrading the stronghold. Throughout the adventure, you need to recruit new heroes and form the strongest team ever, together battle against powerful bosses.

name: Pirate Doom II
description: Pirate Doom II is a 32-level partial conversion for Doom II designed for MBF-compatible source ports, created by Darch.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Swayfield Branch
description: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Trainz Plus: Swayfield Branch
description: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Swayfield Branch
description: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Tile Slider
description: Tile-sliding puzzle game. 20 challenging levels that will test your problem-solving skills. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages, this game combines classic mechanics with modern design, providing hours of engaging gameplay.

name: Tapper Basic
description:
It is a simplification of the classic Tapper game: the aim is to serve all the customers in the saloon while trying not to break all the beer mugs

You will have to try to satisfy all customers because if more than three are not served you will lose one of the three chances to complete your mission. The difficulty level increases as you progress and earn points. The number of customers will also grow so you will have to be clever to serve them all.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Complete Edition
description: Based on the award-winning Brazilian animation Jorel's Brother, Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy is a point-and-click adventure about an eight-year-old boy who lives with his eccentric family in the shadow of Jorel, his handsome and popular brother. Users control Jorel’s Brother as he faces alien spaceships, authoritarian clowns, bureaucracy, driving tests, and avocado smoothies in three episodes full of humor and action.

name: Forza Motorsport: 2019 Ginetta G55 GT4
description: Forza Motorsport 2019 Ginetta G55 GT4

name: Let's School: Water Towns Furniture Pack
description: The Water Towns Furniture Pack provides you with a range of oriental-inspired furniture options, including courtyard & pond decorations, ancient Chinese-style school architecture and a dessert shop that can pair perfectly with the brand-new featured content.

name: Isonzo: Third Wave
description: From specialist high-altitude combat uniforms to exhausted and bloody late war veterans and ersatz troops, the Third Wave contains a broad variety of cosmetic options for Italian and Austro-Hungarian forces. It will also include a third DLC to be announced in the future!

name: DCS: Mi-24P OutPost Campaign by Stone Sky
description: Prepare for an immersive series of campaigns OUTPOST, that places you at the forefront of real combat operations within the Syrian Arab Republic.In the intricate geopolitical landscape, Syria stands as a pivotal outpost for both Russia and the United States.

name: Monster Legacy: New Horizons 2
description: Discover the second part of these peculiar adventurous children who explore fantastic worlds and encounter monsters of all kinds.

name: SOVL: Reptilian Kingdoms
description: This is a Faction Pack for SOVL - Fantasy Warfare. It adds the Reptilian Kingdoms to the game.

name: Calm Down Princess
description: The fairy tale land is distorted! Deliver the item to calm the angry princess! Will you be able to calm the princess and save the fairyland?!! #platformer game #action #adventure #a trap game #a trick game

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Edge of Spring
description: Experience the magic of nature's awakening in 'Edge of Spring' – where every puzzle is a blooming delight! Enjoy 36 gorgeous puzzles.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Olympus
description: Scholars granted access to the most ancient archives may read about the beings who once dwelt on Olympus. The scrolls tell tales of incredible power and terrifying wrath.

name: Spellarium 5
description: This Spellarium introduces several changes to the Match3 game mechanics, one of which is the Toggle Button. Also it includes some skippable bonus games such as Solitaire, Mahjong, Spot the Difference, and Hidden Objects. Of course, there's also a story to follow and a town to build!

name: Makibishi Comic
description: After 17 years, they are back! A remastered version of the point-and-click game that was released on the web in 2007. Is it a game? Is it experimental interactive content? Even the creator doesn't know. Experience a strange and unique worldview that has been played over 10 million times worldwide!

name: Detective Secrets Solitaire: The Curse of the Village
description: Crack a complex case! A detective-themed solitaire game! Engrossing gameplay! A unique solitaire game with a mysterious story!

name: Leafy Trails Collection
description: Immerse yourself in a world of enchantment and renewal as you guide the fox on its quest

name: Poop Spotter: The Game To Improve the Quality of Poop~
description: Monitor the line of the poop factory and find out the defective products. This is a "spot the difference" game with poop.

name: The Thing That Happened
description: Thing That Happened is an Openworld Third Person - Action Adventure Survial game. You can use multiple weapons, attachments, close combat skills tree's and crafting to break through your enemies.

name: ARC: Antic Runes Combat
description: Classic 2D Arcade with Gamepad available! You are "Shadow", a lost soul who has the mission to rescue other souls after the great apocalypse. New for Steam Launch, Events and FREE DLC "Underworld" includes in version 1.5.

name: 6-nen 1-gumi
description: I went to school that night to pick up something I forgot... Aim for class 1 of 6th grade, and if there are no abnormalities, go up the stairs, and if there are any abnormalities, go down the stairs.

name: Devils Wind Mine
description: Devil's Wind Mine is a game where you play as an engineer controlling the pumps, seeking to save the son of a desperate mother. You are the decider of this story. It is your duty, as an engineer, to save as many miners as possible, or just one; the devil waits to be fed inside these passages.

name: Hentai MILF Chloe
description: Chloe is here to help you. She will REWARD you if you finish your chores, you can just sit back and RELAX.

name: Apex Defenders
description: Modular and co-op action-based endless combat simulator.

name: UltraCook
description: Test your cooking & multitasking skills in this arcade Chef Sim!

name: Under The Whisper
description: You are a curious and brave mother cat, a furry tabby with a heart of gold and an adventurous nose looking for the best gift.

name: Space Cats
description: "Space Cats": Zip around as a space cat dodging rockets and grabbing Catnip for double points and a trippy speed boost. A fresh, funny game with a nod to internet culture, blending challenge, humor, and nostalgia.

name: Dwarf Dove
description: A lowpoly style action game, third-person perspective, no experience and bag, Instead is upgrade bar. To defeat the enemy,you can use magic, command skill, block, etc., and you can unlock various command skills and magic. Try to block enemy's fireball in first scene and jump without near obstacles.

name: Lil Doll House
description: In this twisted horror escape game, play as Cynthia, the doll of a vengeful little girl who wants nothing more than to subject you to horrific traps designed to kill. Use strategic thinking to effectively solve action-oriented puzzles and escape with your life. But be quick, the clock is ticking!

name: Isonzo: Altitude Units Pack
description: The ‘Altitude Units’ pack contains clothing for the extreme cold of high altitude Alpine Warfare. There are fur lined coats, thick boots, unique jackets, and dedicated ski uniforms, along with headgear variants, moustaches, goggles, pipes, and new faces.

name: Anomaly Loop
description: You woke up and found yourself in an anomalous endless place from which it is not so easy to get out. Carefully observe your surroundings to find a way out of this place.

name: Choko Nana
description: This is a single-player RPG where you can enjoy the basic elements of combat, collection, exploration, and growth. The game offers a simple experience composed of “little” elements, and the charming interactions between the cute characters are also a highlight.

name: Shadow of Azrael 2
description: The sequel to the epic platform fighter! Featuring 4-Player combat in a fast paced, high-powered battle royale. Fly, blast, and power-up with a brand new experience that blends fighting with RPG elements in a unique and well balanced way!

name: Jonesville
description: Live, learn, and compete in this classic educational life simulator! Play solo against computer, team up with friends in multiplayer (up to 4 players), or take turns in hot seat mode (up to 4 players+computer).

name: Jump Heroes
description: Experience the ultimate thrill of becoming a Jump Hero in this hyper-addictive arcade game! The goal is simple: survive as long as possible, beat your high score, and dominate the leaderboard. Play solo or compete with friends with local co-op mode!

name: Squeen's Adventure: Definitive Edition
description:
A complete remake of the best game ever made! (don't look that up)

After Squeen's beloved spaceship suffers an oil leak, his ship loses control and crash lands onto the planet of Earth. Now while that wouldn't be so bad on its own, Squeen also realizes that his phone's battery is dangerously low! Help Squeen in finding parts all around the globe to repair his ship so he can get back to his home planet and charge his phone!

Remade from the ground up in the same engine that brought Squeen's Adventure 2 & 3 to life, Squeen's Adventure: Definitive Edition is a complete remake of the original Squeen's Adventure. Featuring brand new original assets, brand new sound effects, complete level remakes and reworks, a full achievement system, an original soundtrack, and a whole bunch more, this is the absolute definitive way to play a Jupitr Entertainment classic!

name: The Cursed Legacy
description: The Cursed Legacy is a supernatural investigation set in a dark and mysterious atmosphere. Keep calm and solve the riddles to unravel this strange disappearance. But be careful, you're not alone!

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Hayter's Gunna Game
description:
Former Women's World Champion and English wrestling legend Jamie Hayter is now part of the AEW: Fight Forever roster! The Hayter's Gunna Game DLC also features 5 new premium music tracks!

This content is part of Season Pass 3 which includes:
3 more talents added to the roster, new day and evening beach maps, 33 brand new moves, 42 new skin + attire options, and 11 new music tracks.

name: Incursion Red River
description: Incursion Red River is a tactical first-person extraction shooter set in war-torn modern day Vietnam. Exclusively single-player and co-op gameplay! Customize your loadout, complete contracts & extract, or die trying!

name: Fractured Horizon
description: Fractured Horizon is a fast-paced parkour game, where you use Gravity Fields to traverse through a shattered world. Manipulate gravity, leap between the platforms and overcome obstacles in this speedrunning 3D platformer.

name: Tank Team
description: A team based PVP game where groups of up to 8 players must work together to operate a tank!

name: Two Hands Eggs
description: Two Hands Egg is an emotional egg with two hands...that is, you who play this game. Have fun cooperating with your friends, competing against each other.

name: Boundless Paths
description: A tower-defense roguelike with an emphasis on exploration - reveal monster paths, bonus resources, and sites to place towers. Tackle unique quests and unlock new options across endless procedurally generated maps!

name: Deep Under
description: DEEP UNDER is a grim visual novel about how an ordinary camping trip with friends can turn into a real nightmare.

name: Project Quarantine
description: A tactical first-person shooter, set in a destabilized United States, focusing on single-player and coop gameplay. Customize your loadout, complete contracts & extract!

name: Turbo Kid
description: Turbo Kid is a BMX-powered pixel-art Metroidvania gore-fest based on the film of the same name.

name: Yet Another Fantasy Title
description: Become a rogue in an open-world fantasy RPG, filled with absurd humor and bard music. Go on an epic quest to kill the dragon. Kill filthy orcs, deal with arrogant elves, drink with dwarves, learn spells from hobo-wizards and steal the ring from goblins. All packed in an old-school gameplay style.

name: Ereban: Shadow Legacy
description: Ereban: Shadow Legacy is a fast-paced stealth platformer game where you become Ayana, the last descendant of a forgotten race. Harness mystical shadow powers, high-tech gadgets and avoid or kill to uncover the truth about your past and the key to saving a dying, morally grey universe.

name: Laysara: Summit Kingdom
description: Build and expand your very own settlements in high mountains! Carefully plan production chains and satisfy various needs of your three-caste society while dealing with mountain hazards such as weather breakdowns and avalanches. Are you skilled enough to make your town thrive?

name: Planet Crafter
description: You are sent on an hostile planet with one mission: Make it habitable for Humans. You'll have to survive, collect ressources, build your base and machines in order to heat the planet, create an atmosphere with oxygen and eventually geo-engineer an entire planet.

name: Broken Roads
description:
Broken Roads was born of a love for traditional isometric computer role-playing, and will provide a rich, engaging narrative in which players make their way across a desolated Australia.

Blending together traditional and all-new role-playing elements on top of a classless system offering near-unlimited character development options, Broken Roads presents players with an original morality system: the Moral Compass. This novel design sees dialogue options and questing decisions influence, and be influenced by, a character's philosophical leaning.

name: Underspace
description:
Face thunderous monsters, join up with devious pirates, loot ancient star cities, and make your mark on a galaxy of storms and secrets in this open world lovecraftian spacefighter RPG! Explore a vast handmade universe full of quests, bosses, and loot. Includes online multiplayer and mod support.

Inspired by classic space games, Underspace is an open-world space arcade dogfighting game, where every star system is crafted by hand, and every star system has something to see or do. Jump into the bizarre galaxy of Croft, step into the role you want, and thrive alone or online with friends. But beware! The storms rule the stars.

name: CrimeBot 2: Unsolved Cold Case
description: Become a detective in CrimeBot 2 and travel the world solving criminal cases. You'll have only your logic and intuition to analyze dossiers filled with clues, suspect profiles, and photographs. Can you catch the culprit?

name: Bowser's Revenge 4
description:
Bowser's Revenge 4 has 8 Worlds and an additional Star World, and several unique bosses made specifically for this game. There is quite a fair bit of custom ASM,
especially in the Star World, which should make this an interesting experience.
The difficulty varies as it's fairly easy in the first few worlds, but
difficulty increases a bit past World 6, especially in World 8 and the
Star World. Unfortunately, I can't choose both Standard: Hard and Standard: Normal, but just know it gets more difficult as the game progresses.
As for the bosses, none should be too difficult or too confusing... maybe.

name: FNF Weekly
description: A new FNF mod every single week? You must be tweaking, boss!

name: Believer Clubhouse
description:
Enter a world of Chaos.
Play minigames themed around the content creator Astral Spiff.

name: Stab It VR.com
description: Stab It VR the VR game that CUTS to the PRANK. What's bigger than VR? Videos of people in VR looking like fools Record your friend, dad, or grandma playing Stab It VR for a laugh

name: Accuser
description: A night out takes a drastic turn as Iris' best friend is accused of a crime. She takes it upon herself to find the truth before her friend gets sent straight into a cell.

name: A Solitaire Mystery
description: A collection of 23 mysterious solitaires, with more potentially being added in the future. The solitaires included vary from fairly standard cardgames to funky reimplementations of other games in solitaire form.

name: Hamster Inn
description:
Hotel management when you're an adorable, tiny hamster is no easy task. But somebody's gotta squeak'n do it! Open the world's very first Hamster Inn and serve all sorts of cute animal guests.

Upgrade and decorate your hotel as you provide 5-star service! With each new room, a flurry of whiskered guests eagerly await your service. Ensure their comfort, upgrade your inn, and witness a cascade of delightful moments in this vibrant inn kawaii game & management sim!

name: Drill and Dig!
description: Join inventor Polly on a journey into the underground world in the casual roguelike game "Drill and Dig!". Your goal is to find lost artefacts using an upgradeable drill. Descend deeper, discover resources and upgrades, avoid hazards and show off your digging skills! This game is suitable for a wide audience. It provides a pleasant pastime and enjoyable gaming sessions!

name: Histerya
description: Endless survival horror game where you survive strange creatures in a retro-inspired PS1 experience.

name: Cohabitation Life
description: The protagonist begins cohabiting with his girlfriend, Kanako Tsukishima, whom he started dating in college. Compared to their sweet romance, living together presents many practical challenges. Players must plan their daily lives, balancing academics, lifestyle, and romance.

name: DEPO: Buy Me a Coffee
description: Did you like DEPO and do you want to help me to continue generating content for the game? What better way than to buy me a coffee! Thank you for your support. 🤫Psss... You will also give a coffee inside the game to Meyers.

name: DEPO: Buy Me a XXL Coffee
description: Did you like DEPO and do you want to help me to continue generating content for the game? Wow, you are willing to buy the XXL coffee! It means a lot to me, thank you very much.🤫 Hey... You will also give an XXL coffee inside the game to Meyers.

name: Beat Saber: 2Pac - "All Eyez On Me (feat. Big Syke)"
description: Get the track ‘All Eyez On Me (feat. Big Syke)' by 2Pac on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Nicki Minaj - "Anaconda"
description: Get the track ‘Anaconda' by Nicki Minaj on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Snoop Dogg - "Gin and Juice"
description: Get the track ‘Gin and Juice' by Snoop Dogg on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Eminem - "Godzilla (feat. Juice WRLD)"
description: Get the track ‘Godzilla (feat. Juice WRLD)' by Eminem on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Outkast - "Hey Ya!"
description: Get the track ‘Hey Ya!' by Outkast on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: The Notorious B.I.G. - "Hypnotize"
description: Get the track ‘Hypnotize' by The Notorious B.I.G. on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Dr Dre - "Nuthin’ But A “G” Thang"
description: Get the track ‘Nuthin' But A “G” Thang' by Dr Dre on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Grandmaster Flash & The Furious Five - "The Message"
description: Get the track ‘The Message' by Grandmaster Flash & The Furious Five on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Pop Smoke - "The Woo (feat. 50 Cent, Roddy Ricch)"
description: Get the track ‘The Woo (feat. 50 Cent, Roddy Ricch)' by Pop Smoke on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Legend of Rome 2: The Magic Hourglass
description: Play your way through many exciting and tricky Match 3 levels. Use the help of the gods, collect power-ups and play various bonus games! Build a Roman settlement, embellish all the buildings and enable Laura to return home successfully.

name: Wizards vs. Soldiers And Robots
description: Grab a gun and punch those stupid wizards RIGHT IN THEIR DUMB FACES

name: Escape Room Collection C1
description: This is a collection of Escape Rooms games. In these games, you will be locked in a room and have to find clues and solve puzzles to escape . Each game offers a unique and challenging experience, Only the most clever and resourceful players will succeed in these thrilling Escape Room challenges.

name: Path of Ninja
description: A platform game with a Ninja theme where the player needs collect the Shuricoins and finish by getting the Phantom Blade. At each level the player will have a rank.

name: Whale Captain
description: Embark on your Dream Adventure: Discover uncharted lands, master the waves, and soar the skies! A challenging shoot-em-up bullet dodging game with a dash of side-scrolling platformer featuring a crew with hearts of gold at the ready, awaiting their Whale Captain.

name: Mars Assault: 3D Shooter
description: Mars Assault offers endless hours of action-packed excitement.

name: Hand of the Divine
description: A highscore solitaire deckbuilder where you manage the spheres of influence for the world's divinities. Play and purchase cards to gather as much influence as possible within a limited number of turns.

name: Damn Sewer
description: An indie horror game in which you find yourself in a mysterious abandoned sewer where people disappear. At first there is nothing unusual, but gradually you realize that something terrible lives in the sewer.

name: SpectroPhobia
description: "SpectroPhobia" is a spine-chilling adventure where you must outsmart the shadows in a haunted mansion. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles, and evade the lurking entity. Uncover the mansion's dark secrets to survive.

name: Slime Mayhem
description: You were created by a few scientists for a suicide mission. How long can you survive by clearing mutant slimes?

name: Cube Lands: The Final Wish
description: Welcome to the world of Cube Lands! Solve puzzles using elemental blocks and various other unique and innovative mechanics. Travel through forests, caves, deserts, mountains and much more to defeat the Eye. Be careful, it is always watching...

name: Case: Online
description: Case: Online is a fangame based of Case 2: Animatronics Survival Multiplayer.

name: The Echo Escape
description: Escape from the suspicious space by eluding [them].

name: Fruitio
description: A relaxing, fun and creative physics based puzzle game. Take time out in Fruitio wold and chillax!

name: Math Pixels
description: Engage in pixel strategy: calculate sums to colorize rows and columns. Dive into a minimalist challenge of precision and calculation.

name: Ignis
description: Ignis is a puzzle strategy game with the goal of burning down everything in your path, but totally chill. You control the spreading flames where strategic thinking is the difference between dying out or raging on.

name: Combat Dungeon
description: Combat Dungeon is an excellent 2D action game with RPG elements in which you need to destroy ancient evil and free the captured dungeons

name: The Silent Column
description: After a terrible, supernatural event results in the deaths of most people in the world, Tashen meets fellow survivors and falls in love, as he find himself surrounded by ancient and abstract mysteries.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Cats
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Cats is an puzzel game with cool cats in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Der Anzeigenhauptmeister
description: Slip into the role of the advertising master! Detect illegal parking in a big city and select the correct offense from a list. Collect money for the state and punish traffic offenders for their actions! Law is law!

name: Political Punchers: 2024 Arena
description: In a time where politics feel more like a battleground than a debate, Political Punchers transforms the intensity of the political sphere into an exhilarating 3D fighting game that’s both humorous and thrilling. As the presidential election looms on the horizon, it’s time to elect your fighter!

name: Prehistoric Gal
description: Gal is a cave girl who had her boyfriend, Dude, abducted by aliens! Now she needs to save him, in this 2D mini metroidvania set during prehistoric times!

name: Sophias Pizza Restaurant
description: Help Sophia make her dream of starting a successful pizza restaurant come true. Sophia’s Pizza Restaurant is a fun mash-up of match 3 and time management.

name: Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44
description: Celebrate Steel Division history as you command 14 new divisions in Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44. This major expansion introduces the original Steel Division: Normandy 44’s battlegroups, updated with new arsenals, traits, soldier models, 200 new units, 8 new aces and new voice-acting.

name: Three Kingdoms and Martial Arts and Jianghu
description: A sandbox role-playing game that combines the Three Kingdoms and martial arts

name: My Head On Your Body
description: A short psychological horror story about a girl, a murder, and a missing head.

name: Outside the Door
description: Outside the door is a mystic visual novel set within one office. You are about to figure out the stories of a few visitors without having a single memory of yourself.

name: Destiny 2: Into The Light
description: Destiny 2: Into the Light will deliver new game content, available for all players, throughout the months of April and May in preparation for the launch of The Final Shape in June.

name: Cool Cucumber Cricket
description: When you think of cricket what comes to mind? That's right this game needs more cards! In This game you'll attempt to lead your team to test victories by playing cards that make your players better or their players worse.

name: Dead Man's Hand: Card Roulette Action
description: Dead Man’s Hand is a 2-8 player party game that combines the classic game of Russian Roulette with the unpredictable nature of card games.

name: Zombie Apocalypse Survivor
description: This is a survivor zombie game, you encounter a lot of zombies in an abandoned village, they are very dangerous, you must survive here. So you must strengthen yourself, upgrade your weapons, enhance your various attributes, and fight the zombies face to face!

name: AC Sailing
description: Experience high-tech sailing with AC Sailing. Foil and maneuver the latest generation yachts in fast-paced online multiplayer races against top sailors worldwide. Master your skills for victory in this thrilling game.

name: Village Dealer
description: Wheel and deal in a charming rural town! Drive your truck, negotiate with local farmers, ranchers, and fishermen, and upgrade your vehicle to maximize profits. Manage limited inventory, form strategic relationships, and become the ultimate dealer in this captivating business.

name: Sketchy's Contract
description: A co-op sci-fi horror where players travel to exotic planets to farm minerals, kill creatures, and/or find hidden loot that can be brought to an asteroid belt and turned in for rewards.

name: Gigantic: Rampage Edition
description: Gigantic: Rampage Edition is a premium and definitive release of the original 5v5 MOBA Hero Shooter, Gigantic, that provides a dynamic and exciting team-based multiplayer experience for fans of both genres. Choose from a diverse roster of unique heroes, each with a set of upgradeable abilities, and team up with four other players to control objectives and take down the opposing team’s mighty Guardian, all while protecting your own. Gigantic: Rampage Edition includes a new game mode, cross platform play, new heroes, new maps, and gameplay improvements that give fans a bigger and more complete GIGANTIC experience than ever before, while welcoming new players to the action and fun-filled world of a Hero Shooter.

name: LoveCraft
description: Welcome to the new virtual reality! Metaverse LoveCraft is a home to interesting people, fun parties, exploration and fulfilling relationships! You create your own world, from your unique persona to their exciting adventures.

name: Children of the Sun
description: Burning with anger, The girl wages a one-woman war against the cult, taking them down cultist by cultist, bullet by bullet, until she reaches her true target: the leader. Along the way she will unravel the dark truth about this mysterious order and the atrocities committed by them in the name of their master. In this tactical third-person puzzle-shooter you assume control of one bullet, guiding it through increasingly complex and challenging levels to kill cultists, trigger traps, and reshape the environment. Every shot counts and ruthless precision is rewarded. Taking down the cult is deeply satisfying; doing it with style even more so.

name: Dumball Rush
description: Dumball Rush is an online racing party game from 2 to 8 players with a 3D third person view. The player controls a snowball that is racing against other players. Roll in the snow to be bigger and faster! Avoid obstacles and activate gifts to take advantage and win the race!

name: Night Grove
description: This is a first-person indie horror game. A young deliveryman took an unusual order that led him to Night Grove. This place has a dubious reputation among the townspeople, because for many years it has been sent to live with people that society has long since abandoned.

name: Mine & Slash
description: Embark on an epic quest in this roguelite RPG where you explore dungeons, mine for gold, and battle fierce foes. Upgrade your gear, face daunting bosses, and uncover hidden treasures. Customize your hero with powerful loot and master new skills for endless adventure and surprises!

name: Last Hope Bunker: Zombie Survival
description: Attention, brave survivor! The world has fallen victim to a devastating virus that threatens humanity's very existence. But amidst the chaos, a glimmer of hope remains. Join the gripping story of Last Hope Bunker and embark on a heart-pounding journey to save humanity from the clutches of the undead

name: Luminite Era: Expedition
description: "Luminite Era: Expedition" is a 2D pixel-style side-scrolling action game. Players will use different weapons and unique spell mechanisms to defeat monsters from the "Black Fog" and explore the truth of the world.

name: Glimmer Chain
description: Glimmer Chain is a skill-based platformer in which you are an energized robot with a hook and a chain. Swing and light up the city in the shortest time possible!

name: Final Factory
description: Final Factory blends factory building with a rich universe to explore. Build a vast network of automated space stations and command a massive fleet against the hostile local aliens. Discover new technologies and unlock the secrets of an ancient civilization as you explore an infinite cosmos.

name: Botany Manor
description: Welcome to Botany Manor, a stately home in 19th century England. You play as its inhabitant Arabella Greene, a retired botanist. Explore your house and gardens, filled with botanical research, to figure out the ideal habitat for a collection of forgotten flora. Grow each plant to discover the mysterious qualities they hold…

name: The Happies: Amber Falcon
description: After the destruction of homeworld, you fled into space and were shipwrecked in an unknown location. Build a hot air balloon from the wreckage of the lander. Explore strange places, discover ancient artifacts, collect resources to repair the ship. Save the crew and maybe find a new home...

name: Yellow Taxi Goes Vroom
description: Make full use of your advanced move-set to navigate hand-crafted retro worlds without a jump button in this vibrant love letter to the N64 era of collectathons!

name: Inkbound
description: Go on co-op adventures in Inkbound, an online roguelike from the creators of Monster Train. Craft powerful character builds in procedurally generated runs and battle your way past the inky hordes with a unique active battle system.

name: Crown of Pain
description: Crown of Pain is a match-3 RPG. Heroes venture to the castle to find the elusive crown of pain, an artifact which is said to take away all of their worries.

name: Pong Temple
description: Set in a fantasy atmosphere inspired by Incan mythology, Pong Temple takes the well-known gameplays of Pong and Brick Breaker and mixes them into a procedural dungeon crawler focused on action and reflexes.

name: Tetra Tactics
description: Strategize, collect, upgrade. Tetra Tactics (formerly known as Card Craft) is a roguelike deckbuilder inspired by Triple Triad and Tetra Master with deep meta-progression and replayability. Outwit your opponents on a 4x4 tactical grid, traverse the map, augment your cards, and combine abilities to ultimately build the most powerful deck.

name: Pleasuredrome
description: Short erotic visual novel made for the DOMINO CLUB BODIES IN MOTION JAM.

name: Midnight T-Rex
description: Play as a dinosaur. Explore a mysterious dungeon, defeat foes, and challenge bosses in this roguelite game.

name: Heaven's Cybernetic (De)Athlete: Zeug
description:
"RUN LEAP GRIND AND MOST IMPORTANTLY ]]KILL

*A DEVASTATING MINDHACK. A BROKEN SIMULATION. REALITY SEEPING WITH BUGS AND GLITCHES. POWER THROUGH.*"

A browser-based death tournament DOOMlike made for DOMINO CLUB's Bodies in Motion Jam.

name: Fugu
description: Eat as many carrots as you can while avoiding the shurikens coming your way.

name: Fragmented Almanac
description:
Embark on an enigmatic odyssey through time and space in Fragmented Almanac, a mesmerizing narrative puzzle game redefining retro gaming on the SEGA Dreamcast.

You will embark on a journey through a complex timeline, exploring The Hideout—a repository of alchemical knowledge, ancient tales, and mystical symbols. As a trapped spirit seeking to reunite with its original body, you will unravel the mysteries of this enigmatic realm.

Additionally, players will delve into the alternate universe of Summoning Signals, assuming the role of The Pilot aboard the Sprinter-2 ship, which has crash-landed on an Unknown Planet. Amidst a blend of futuristic technology and ancient ruins, players must navigate the labyrinthine landscapes, repairing their ship and unraveling the secrets of this strange world.

At the junction of video games, new media art and alchemy, this project is the culmination of 7 years of Dreamcast development, spread over 5 different games. Fragmented Almanac is a short but dense experience and offers a modern twist on retro gaming, combining nostalgic aesthetics with innovative gameplay.

Are you ready to uncover the fragments and embark on an enigmatic journey shrouded in mystery?

name: FIN: The Way Home
description: Congratulations! You've just started your first day as a handler-in-training at Oceans of Adventure, the one and only destination to view carcharmorphs: a rare, mysterious species of humanoid fish. Don't let their looks deceive you though, despite their humanlike appearance, they're just an odd looking fish... Right?

name: GeoGrid
description:
GeoGrid is a daily trivia game made to put your geography knowledge to the test!

Guess a country for each box in the board that matches the criteria specified by the box's row and column categories. Each box on any given board has anywhere from 5 to 30 unique answers. A new game board is generated each day at 12am EST.

Players have 10 guesses to fill out the grid, but can enable infinite mode for unlimited.
A country can only be guessed once per game board.

name: Terror Trivia
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Builderment Idle
description: Sit back and relax while your factory idly harvests, crafts, and sells items for you.

name: Lullaby in Dreams
description: An adventure game project for children. A cave-in in a dungeon begins an adventure in an unknown land, for some an isekai, for the others an adventure in search of answers.

name: Amelie And The Lost Spirit
description: Dive into the intense "Amelie And The Lost Spirit," a single-player action game set in a horror environment. Help Amelie find her way out of the witch's realm. Seek help from your Ghost friends as you try to escape the witch's clutches to your freedom.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: SA CL Class - SSR Pack 01
description: The CLF and CLP Classes were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features four CLF and CLP locomotives operated by Southern Shorthaul Railroad; these being CLF1 (SSR Yellow/Black), CLF3 (Primer white), CLP9 (Auscision) and CLP12 (Primer white).

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 4
description: This Outlaw Pack includes (2) Outlaw type vehicles, with slick and wheelie bars, and Radial tire versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Tintin Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Tintin

name: Ur
description: The Royal Game of Ur, also called Twenty Squares, has a history stretching over five millennia with examples found across the Mediterranean! This is a 3D gameplay experience taking you into the ancient world! The game board set is a 3D reconstruction of an ancient example from a museum.

name: Trouble Comes Twice: Bonus Stories
description: An optional DLC that adds additional post-story moments to Trouble Comes Twice! Enjoy various short stories starring the twins and their love interests.

name: Waki & The Lost Spirits
description: Waki & the Lost Spirits is a 2D action platformer with some tastes of a metroidvania game. In this game you will explore the forest, fight enemies, solve puzzles, complete challenges, beat some bosses in order to save the lost spirits of the forest.

name: FellaTrain
description: Simulation for adults practicing mature activitie. J-Eroge that's simple to play and easy to enjoy.

name: Pinhead Adventures
description: The First Game from Neversold Studios, Pinhead Adventures is a planet hopping, gun toting, sword swinging, grappling adventure! Zortan has killed every last living soul except for the Pinhead and Orbo. Join Pinhead and Orbo to fight Zortan in this 3D Action Platformer!

name: Night Bus
description: Night Bus is a thrilling public transit simulator that costs less than a bus ticket! It's your first night on the job: Pick up passengers, take their fares, enjoy the beautiful countryside, and please ignore That Which Has No Eyes.

name: ATV Bike Games
description: Welcome to the world of quad bike games with real physics. This cool ATV racing game will not leave anyone indifferent! Ride bikes through realistic locations, compete and have fun! Play with your friends online!

name: 100 Kills Challenge: Origins
description: Enter the fray in an intense, fast paced first person shooter experience. Kill using firearms, explosives, drones, and air support. Dominate maps in deathmatch, team, and PVE. Win with tactics - or sheer brutality. Remember: Hundred kills. One arena. Zero rules. May the best player win!

name: Twin Hawk
description: Take on powerful tanks and battleships with the best use of your fighter in this military themed vertical arcade shoot ‘em up by Toaplan! Summon friendly fighter planes to avoid emergencies and increase firepower. Now on PC with modern enhancements!

name: Dogyuun
description: A science fiction-themed vertically scrolling shoot 'em up game known for its stunning detailed pixel art, gigantic bosses, and a menacing difficulty. From the legendary studio Toaplan, this is quite possibly the most rock and roll shooting game of all time.

name: Shoot Giant Robots and Wallrun
description: A fast-paced, score-attack movement shooter. Mow down an endless horde of robots, flying through hand-crafted arenas at breakneck speeds.

name: Truxton 2
description: The sequel to Toaplan’s shoot ‘em up masterpiece Truxton is a thrilling insane space action with an unforgiving difficulty level. Enjoy the visually stunning pixel graphics and vibrant music as you dodge the high-speed bullet rain and take on tough bosses.

name: Grind Stormer
description: Grind Stormer, aka V・V, is a vertically scrolling manic shooter with gorgeous pixel art graphics and an upbeat FM soundtrack. Developed by an all-star team at the legendary Japanese studio Toaplan, known for their stellar shoot ‘em ups.

name: Black Hole Escape
description: You take on the role of a lost astronaut who must return to the spaceship in zero-gravity space. Refill oxygen, avoid obstacles, and head towards the destination. Discover endless possibilities in this unique space adventure!

name: Only Climber
description: Only Climber is a game to reach the top, created by combining many platform elements. It has a single-player structure in the FPS genre. Feel the challenge in the world of many different themes in this game, which shows that reaching the top has never been this difficult.

name: Function Ball
description: You input any function to guide the red ball on the plane to the goal.

name: Forgotten Magic Tower
description: A dark maze style map exploration meat pigeon game, defeating enemies in a foggy dungeon to search for treasures, finding the entrance to the next level, and gradually collecting equipment to strengthen and defeat bosses and difficult official cards

name: Deck of Delirium
description: Deck of Delirium is a PvE deckbuilding card game where you build your own misfit crew full of animals, pirates, animal pirates, pompous sailors, and even cultists to make your way through the perilous journey across the sea battling rogue pirates, sea monsters, and other uncanny enemies.

name: Water Festa
description: Water Festa is a top-down shooter inspired by Thailand's Songkran water festival. You play as a mermaid girl, balancing wetness to remain human, dodge water to avoid becoming too wet, but seek it when dry. Expect a casual bullet hell experience as people continuously shower you.

name: Arsene Bomber: Cosmic
description: With the Bomberman-inpired game dive headfirst into the chaos. Battle up to 4 players, and conquer 6 thrilling modes. The choice is yours! Play solo for a personal challenge or invite friends to join the chaos. – join the hunt now!

name: Please Leave Me Alone, I Need to Poop
description: Part visual novel, part WarioWare-inspired minigame collection, Please Leave Me Alone, I Need to Poop is a modern workplace comedy that you can beat within a short session in your office bathroom stall. Multiple stories, multiple minigames, and multiple endings provide replayability.

name: Floain
description: What is happiness? Happiness is the sea, the wind, the rainstorm -- and the eternal love "Perhaps I can also live a peaceful and happy life like an ordinary person." Stay tuned, the exciting story of the evening rain and flowing flowers

name: Touhou Eternal Spell Cards
description: In Eastern Eternal Spell Cards,The balance between humans and yokai is at stake as the evil yokai, Black Shadow, awakens to conquer the Eastern world. Through intense bullet-hell battles, she faces challenging stages and enemies to become the savior. DISCORD：https://discord.gg/pQe2bgqEzC

name: Un/Fragment
description: A short 10 minute visual novel about being a fragment in the universe and trying to find a way out of the ****.

name: Summoneer
description: Summoneer is a platformer and puzzle game, where you engineer your own designs.

name: Meatgrinder
description: MeatGrinder is a mech-shooter themed shooter where you have to pilot and assemble your own mech on a desert planet to fight against ferocious monsters from outer space.

name: Learn Japanese: Yuke and the Book of Yokai
description: Learn Japanese in this roguelike deckbuilder adventure brimming with Japanese flavor! Defeat yokai with your knowledge, gather omamori, and befriend the local guardian, Myōkun the Tanuki. Embark on your language-learning adventure and have fun!

name: Witchy Woes
description: When a power hungry, egotistical young witch disobeys her school’s headmasters, she is cast out and exiled. Play as Devious Donna as she wreaks havoc on those who have wronged her. Harness the dark arts and exact your revenge on the masters of magic.

name: Doodle Streets: London 1950's
description: Visit the Fifties & Sixties of the 20th-century London to find hidden things in this interactive, hand-drawn and animated game.

name: Pantheon: Card Game of Hentai - Part 1
description: Throw yourself into a fascinating adventure on the beach where you will meet mysterious goddesses! Defeat your opponents to win their favor and discover the secrets of their magical world.

name: Dice Crypt
description: Dive into Dice Crypt! A thrilling digital board game where you and your friends compete to conquer a mysterious dungeon. Roll the dice, face monsters, loot treasures, and outwit rivals. Will you conquer the crypt?

name: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions
description: Study, relax, or get productive in the cozy world of Spirit City. Set the mood with lofi beats and soundscapes, customize your character and spirit pet, and use the productivity tools to help you stay on task. All while discovering cute hidden spirits and adding them to your spirit collection.

name: Der Pfad des Pinguins
description:
You wake up in a snow-covered landscape and can't remember anything. You have to find out how you got to this place and survive. On your journey you meet penguins who confront you with a mysterious disease. Can you help the penguins?

This is a RPG Adventure Game!

name: Mayhem Survivors: Animals
description: Mayhem Survivors is an action rogue-like game, where you feed cute animals with various different foods in order to Survive. It is inspired by Survivors-like games and features 3 different game modes.

name: Banbard
description: An RPG focused on character customization for combat, and having characters break there own fate to grow and build upon themselves. Customize your play style as you see fit, build relationships with your party and grow to overcome any personal or interpersonal challenge that comes your way.

name: Cast Out Colony
description: Cast Out Colony combines roguelite and bullet-heaven action with robust town-building elements. Choose from various characters, fight hordes of foes, and grow your colony, which in return grows your stats, offering a unique twist on the survival genre.

name: My First Horse: Adventures on Seahorse Island
description: Adventure awaits with Olivia and her trusty horse on a stunning island full of excitement and mystery. Join them on thrilling quests and explore beautiful landscapes. This horse game has something for everyone. Don't miss out on this immersive experience. Saddle up and join the adventure!

name: Kiki
description:
Put your platforming prowess to the test as you navigate vibrant 3D obstacle courses in first-person perspective! Kiki is a fast-paced action experience that’s laser-focused on precision platforming skills. Run and jump while dodging treacherous traps, collecting stars and trophies, finding keys to unlock gates and more, all set to a pumping chiptune soundtrack!

There are 60 obstacle courses to master across multiple worlds, each presenting a unique challenge and gradually increasing in difficulty as you progress. Clear mission goals and race against the clock to unlock new stages, or replay cleared levels to improve your score! Do you have what it takes to become the true master of jumping?

name: Tales Of Polygonia
description: Tales Of Polygonia - a 2.5D souls-like RPG with crafting and survival elements.

name: Throne of Bone
description: Draft minions to defeat those who oppose the honest work of necromancy. Learn spells, forge relics, and restore your castle to unite the land through undeath in this rogue-like amalgam of turn-based combat and strategic engine-building.

name: Sheba: A New Dawn
description: Sheba: A New Dawn is an action adventure metroidvania game that takes you through a compelling story of revenge and despair. Fight your way through the next decisive battle, A New Dawn. Explore the world of Sheba and the corruption of Jinn possessions.

name: Black Trail
description: Black Trail is a VR FPS, set in an epic war in the old west. Play as a bounty hunter and a native warrior, follow their interwoven stories, use historic weapons, explore, escape, infiltrate, loot, adapt, survive and fight as you chase newly discovered artifacts to change the fate of war.

name: Hispanic Community Project
description: Hispanic Community Project {HCP} is a boom-format megawad inspired by Doom 2 In Spain Only and JPCP made by members of the hispanic doom community and spanish-speaking mappers. Thanks to @OceanMadman for the project's idea!

name: Untitled Risk of Rain Fighting Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Mythic Samkok
description: Sin descripción

name: Chatterbox
description: Introducing Chatterbox - the desktop chat app that brings back the simplicity of text-based communication. A piece of Interactive Fiction written for the 2024 Dialogue Jam.

name: Camundongo Miguel na Ilha dos Novo Pogos
description: Sin descripción

name: Forgiveness RPG: The First Chapter - Part Three
description: Sin descripción

name: Katana Of Rin
description: Slice through darkness to become the greatest samurai. Stealth mode and shurikens add layers of strategy, while grappling hooks require you to navigate with grace.

name: VR Harem Sex: Mai DLC
description: Immersive harem experience in VR space! High functionality and freedom with lesbian play, cross-sectional views, big tits/poor tits, and more!

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Chihuahuas
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: My Favorite Notification
description: A 5 minute Visual Novel made in Bitsy, about a Discord call between two trans friends.

name: Bicolor Bird
description: Sin descripción

name: I Got Straddled by a Femboy
description: You find yourself at the horse racetrack without any entertainment. Try to find something to do...

name: Owner
description: A RPG adventure game where society, economy, philosophy and politics mix in a fun and ironic way, forcing the player to take tough decisions that challenge morality and affect the game ending.

name: Mazelit: Rolling With Style
description: Roll your own player character by choosing from six more style options for Mazelit - or create your own and use it in the game.

name: JTAC Beats
description: Utilize rhythm to direct your fields of fire to beat the enemy with the drums of war. Let them die for their country to the songs of your people.

name: Kyber Kraft
description: Cyber roguelite RPG with immersive crafting and progression. Fight neon bots in fast and exciting combat with 2D physics engine. Equip your hero with various nodes to grant unique attacks and abilities. Listen to immersive synthwave music and enjoy epic visual effects.

name: Void Keeper
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of our mobile game and uncover the secrets hidden behind each portal! Embark on adventures alongside the main character, Bizi, who manages monsters and portals.

name: Void Whispers
description: Assume the role of a broadcast engineer in a tranquil city. All seems peaceful until the sky above starts to reveal something deeply unsettling.

name: Source of the Nile: Digital Edition
description: The single-player version of the legendary board game "Source of the Nile", finally brought to the digital realm. A challenging game of discovery played on a hexagon-grid map showing known Africa ca. 1820, in which the player competes with nature in order to survive.

name: Spaceship Driver License
description: Welcome to the galaxy of technologies! It feels very good that it keeps getting closer and closer to ordinary people

name: Mazelit
description: Light your way through mazes, collect energy, and level up to gain upgrade points. Don't get cornered by enemies or you will face hefty repair costs. Those high-tech upgrades break easily!

name: Amulet
description: Embark on a gothic hack-and-slash RPG in "Amulet." Shape your character with a unique "pure loot" system, choose your class, master weapons, and face evil creatures. Dynamic gameplay and a dark world await. Become the hero in "Amulet."

name: Maronia
description: Maronia is a roguelike game where you control a 2D pixel character to withstand attacks from monsters for a limited time. Upgrade your skills and defeat your enemies to survive until the end. It's all up to you.

name: Answer To Survive
description: Can you win in the best show in the afterlife?

name: Cross the Maze World
description: Independently develop games, 3d games, and travel through the maze world to explore, kill monsters, and solve puzzles

name: Black Sails
description: As a daring space buccaneer, assemble your crew, navigate treacherous cosmos, engage in epic battles, and uncover hidden treasures on mysterious planets. Forge your legend as the most notorious captain in the galaxy!

name: Ukraine Total Defense
description: Ukraine Total Defense is a tower defense game about the Ukraine war.

name: Shadow Strikers
description: In a city dominated by underworld organizations, street violence gives way to an unusual pact. "The Shadow Tournament". In Shadowhaven each organization chooses a champion to fight on its behalf, where victories bring power and influence. Get ready.

name: Nobody
description: Nobody, the game! Spirits, monsters and autonomous machines will attack you, military traps abandoned for many centuries will return to work with your simple presence, you will also have to face earthquakes and avalanches.

name: Bob's Mansion
description: Bob's Mansion is a First-Person, Survival Horror, Adventure game where you use your skills to Run, Hide, Fight and Survive the darkness within your family home.

name: Master of Vtuber
description: There are many reasons why someone would want to become a Vtuber, but regardless of the initial motivations for embarking on this journey, there is only one ultimate goal – to become a Vtuber Master who is loved and welcomed by the audience, capable of standing out on their own!

name: Shuntle
description:
You get 6 tries to guess the secret word. The secret word is between 4 and 7 letters and you can guess words between 4 and 7 letters. Shorter secret words may have trailing spaces or leading spaces. Spaces might be at the beginning, the end, or both.

Letters in your guess are: green if you guessed a letter in the right place; yellow if the letter is somewhere else in the word; or grey if the letter is not in the word.

name: Great Time Trio Remake
description: The events of the game take place after a temporal paradox caused by the Anomaly/Player, this event causes the judges from the Underfell, Fellswap & Storyfell universe to come together in a single timeline to fight the player together.

name: PoeticRambling
description: "PoeticRambling" is coded as a layered ramble in Twine. With an interactive fiction approach to a ramble that happens to rhyme.

name: Eternal Match
description: A mobile Gladiator Competitive Multiplayer Game With character that inspired by the Greek Gods, you can Download it at Google Play, Soon be released at Steam

name: Helium Run
description: Inflate your balloons and rise to the top!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Brazilian Dunes Rally
description: Ride along fast tracks in the middle of paradisiacal dunes and lagoons during a race full of speed, dust, and adrenaline. Come with us to Brazilian Dunes Rally. This DLC includes: - Roller coaster map: Brazilian Dunes Rally. - One roller coaster cart.

name: Uncle's Basement: Collector's pack
description: The DLC adds 22 items to be found. Find all the items, you will get the achievement in the main game.

name: Hole io & Paper io 2
description: Here's the ultimate action bundle you've been waiting for! Eat & conquer solo or with friends in multiplayer mode!

name: Infantry Attack: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Box To The Beat VR: Indie Electro Beats
description: Introducing the "Indie Electro Beats" DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Enjoy 10 unique tracks crafted by two up and coming artists! Feel the intensity as you sync your punches with the beats made by these talented creators. Step into the ring and prepare to be challenged as you take on these intense levels!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Insects
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Sea of Chaos
description: RTS (Real-Time Strategy)，Base Defense，Recruit Minions，Character Development，Multi-Part

name: Cosmic Hare
description: A puzzling universe of talkative rabbits to jump.

name: Lost Inside: Act 1
description: Lost Inside is a non-traditional, character-focused, action-adventure RPG about a human child who stumbles their way into the Spirit World.

name: Silverwood Bay: An Eleanor Grey Mystery
description: Eleanor Grey moves to Silverwood Bay to seek inspiration for her writing.

name: XP Racing
description: XP Racing is a love letter to the classic racing games from the NES era!

name: Solstale
description: Solstale will take you on a whimsical 2D platformer adventure . Run, jump, and explore vibrant levels with friends. It's more than a game; it's a heartwarming journey into a hand-drawn universe.

name: Checkout!
description: Checkout! is a casual and chaotic couch multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Dive into a wild shopping spree across the multiverse. Race against your friends to complete your shopping list. Whether locally or online via Remote Play Together, mayhem awaits. Can you shop your way to victory?

name: Curse Seal Rotation
description: Curse Seal Rotation is a rougelike card game. You will play a warrior to defeat invaders one after another. On this difficult road, you will encounter various monsters and elites. Please become as strong as possible to defeat them.

name: Liwertown: Rebirth
description: It's the middle of the night and a zombie pandemic just broke in this dark 2D platformer world. Explore the town, Fight zombies, Find the last survivors, and Discover who is behind the mysterious factory explosion that caused it all, all while following the story from 2 different points of view.

name: Fractals of Destiny
description: Fractals of Destiny is an Hybrid RPG with a epic story that is mixed by the best features from action RPGs and classic RPGs with blends them seamlessly. Feel the vibes in the world that mixed by magic and futuristic

name: Virvius
description: Scour through the fallen foundry, obscuring enemies and creatures whilst plundering to your death, get ripped apart or circumvent through harsh environments and traps. Let the gun do the talking, so sit back, relax and blow everything to pieces.

name: Lost Surreal Hell
description: A Turn Based RPG, where you collect elements, and evolve your attacks, but if you wander too far off the path, you may end up stuck in a strange surreal hell full of disjointed worlds full of surreal comedy shows, brainwashing, a strange company running a dying MMO in the backrooms and a dark truth.

name: Awara
description: Awara is a platform game whose story takes place in French Guiana. The goal of the game is to collect awaras while avoiding rotten or toxic awaras. To do this, you will have to jumd and slip in order to evolve in the forest.

name: Yet Another Solitaire Game
description:
Yet Another Solitaire Game (YASG) includes the following solitaire games: Klondike, Spider, Freecell, Yukon, Alaska, and Scorpion,

Yet Another Solitaire Game is designed for fans of the Solitaire card game who want to test their skills against other players. Online tournaments start all day, every few minutes, according to various settings. Joining players must solve exactly the same hand at the same time. During the competition, the program monitors many factors and scores the competitors based on this. At the end of the tournament, players can compare their results.

name: Sherlock Purr 2: Extended Edition
description: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Decomission
description: A map that was originally meant for a personal project that never happened. Mainly a brown storage facility with plenty of green foliage.

name: Paravox
description: Paravox is a high action 3v3 PvP third-person shooter.

name: Gridlock Dungeon
description: Try to clear creatures by traveling on an uninterrupted path through the grid.

name: Dreamland: Chapter 2
description: Welcome to Dreamland! A town which hosts the wildest college spring break activities filled with hot girls, parties and sex. However, if you look close enough, you'll discover that Dreamland also hides a dark and horrifying mystery which haunts you and your friends...

name: Hop Spring Girl
description: "Hop Spring Girl" is a 2D platform action game where you aim to reach the top by controlling hopping.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 01
description: Season 3 Episode 1: No Way Alone! With the help of his friends and a grappling hook, Peter embarks on a reckless plan to fly to Chill Haven and save Cody.

name: Bio Inc. Redemption + Crossroads Inn: Doctors and Bartenders Bundle
description: Bio Inc. Redemption + Crossroads Inn - Manage tavern or manage live and death!

name: Moonshine Inc. + Bio Inc. Redemption: Drinking Problem Deluxe Bundle
description: Run moonshine business or become doctor (or death) - Moonshine Inc. + Bio Inc. Redemption

name: Ubersoldier
description: Get ready for an epic World War II adventure like no other with UberSoldier! Immerse yourself in a gripping first-person shooter that will transport you to the heart of the action. This game developed by Burut Creative Team will have you on the edge of your seat.

name: Kitty Patrol: Paw Showtime
description: Discover the adventures of this patrol of adventurous kittens who will have to save the world together.

name: Shaman's Mask of the Rune Magic
description: Sin descripción

name: 3Souls: Parallel Edition
description: In the world of Mustland, each Ánima has a different soul, and they will see, feel, hear and play the world in a different way!

name: PuzzMiX
description:
In PuzzMiX, players will control falling "Lola Pods" to merge pairs into increasingly larger types. As the Lola Pods get bigger and bigger, the player will earn bigger scores as the chaos becomes even harder to control. Online leaderboards are included to show off the best Lola MiXers around the world.

When players earn a certain amount of score, they'll unlock a new song from Lola herself to listen to during the game. 19 vocal tracks are included in addition to 1 instrumental BGM.

name: Wobbles
description: Play as a godly figure, guiding a line of adorable creatures called Wobbles across a landscape that you manipulate using various gadgets. As you do this, you progress the Wobbles civilization through the eras and advancing their technology, ultimately unlocking new gadgets for you to use.

name: Zombodesert
description: Are you afraid of running out of water in a desert? Well, it doesn't seem to be the biggest danger you can encounter.

name: Cooking Arena: 10 in 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kebab Bar Tycoon: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Destronaut: Landed X Loaded
description:
How long can you survive in this hostile robot arena?

Battle for as long as possible in 10 different arenas, each with its own unique set of challenges. Shoot down enemy combatants, and gain special power-up drones that add extra firepower to your side. How long can you survive?

name: Devil's Calling
description: Lift the curse. Get revenge on The Bad Man.

name: StarFlow
description: Lead the story of Nella, a little witch and apprentice to the witch of the western forest. Learn various skills and magic, and interact with people through activities like farming and fishing!

name: The Courage to be Disliked
description: A Healing Journey to Find Yourself

name: Stunt Scooter Simulator
