name: Echoes of The Deep
description:
Echoes of The Deep is a pixelart roguelite dungeon game where you fight your way through the levels of the dungeon. In these levels you'll encounter different enemies, treasures and more. This game features and adaptive difficulty system that will adhere to how you perform.

Will you overcome the dungeon a victor, or will you succumb to the Echoes of The Deep like the many before you..

name: TypeSpell Journey
description: It is a relaxing and casual software suitable for users of all ages. It can be used to learn words, practice spelling or typing. It can be a game or an educational tool, depending on how you use it.

name: Gzlna
description: Her name is Gloria, and the pleasure is all yours. Gzlna is a short arcade / cinematic experience, with fast-paced combat and tight controls.

name: Heisting
description: What could be more exciting than the thrill of a perfectly performed heist?

name: Star Legends
description: "Star Legends" is a game set in the backdrop, where various alien races compete for control over planetary resources using advanced civilizations. Players take on the role of a commander, leading their faction to victory against other alien species in a gripping tale of cosmic conquest.

name: Bodyrain
description: Slaughter hordes of zombies and challenging bosses in Bodyrain: a zombie FPS game! Accumulate money to acquire new weapons and gain experience to strengthen your character and clean up Dawn City!

name: Meet The Animals
description: A comedic twist on the average stylized exploration indie game, find your way around this beautiful farm and interact with the animals that have been scattered across the landscape.

name: Clue For Your Thoughts
description: Sift through the evidence to find out who did it.

name: Sex Maids
description: Sex Maids - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Moto Parkour
description: Moto Parkour is an adrenaline-pumping game that will take you on a thrilling ride high above the clouds.

name: Backflip
description: Backflip is an exciting game that challenges you to perform as many back jumps as possible, pushing your acrobatic skills to the limit.

name: The Boy Sorcerer: Lost memory
description: Help Anant escape the tower curse. You will climb the tower, unlock new memories until you complete all game modes for each floor. Good luck and may your memory serve you well.

name: Super Pixel Merge Balls
description: Drop balls and combine them to get enough points until you find the Master Beach Ball Thug Life on this cute, fun and relaxing pixel art game. How many point will you get?

name: Horror School Story
description: Immerse yourself in the foreboding atmosphere of Enspire School of Digital Art, brought to life with realistic graphics. Solve intricate puzzles and face psychological challenges to progress through the nightmarish school environment. FACE YOUR FEAR and ESCAPE THE NIGHT.

name: Offroad Jeep Quest: Mountain Trails
description: The wild awaits—are you ready to conquer it?

name: RollTale
description: 3D and Rhythm Based Music Game Jump and avoid obstacles on the platform

name: Bet Your Brain
description: Bet Your Brain is a trivia game with the twist of gambling. Players alternate between answering questions and participating in gambling minigames to accumulate the most wealth. Compete against bots or your friends in an attempt to call yourself the King of both knowledge and luck.

name: Killmage
description: The Sound rings into the night, don't stop, kill them all.

name: BlitzBot
description: BlitzBot is a minimalist and modern arcade game that expands the air hockey genre. Take control of a robot and dive into dynamic and thrilling battles, where the objective is to score more goals than your opponent. Utilize the unique abilities at your disposal to destabilize and take the lead.

name: The Scar
description: The scar is an open world adventure and survival game, where you can create your own weapons and tools, build bases and fight against what were once humans and aliens. You will be able to use Ashun's summons, which to our eyes is magic.

name: Frayed
description: A small survival horror game set in a cornfield. Sneak around on the farm, solve puzzles and uncover the mysteries of the past! Try not to get lost in the corn...

name: AsteroidTD
description: Try to survive in infinite asteroid cloud as long as possible in reworked tower defence style. FInd your own playstyle and beat your own records or chillout with original ambient soundtracks. Build, explore, think - everything to create your own colony in this cold space.

name: Minesweeper Infinite
description: A classic logic puzzle game taken to the natural conclusion: Infinity.

name: Banshee Hunt
description: Banshee Hunt is a hunting horror game featuring the Banshee, a supernatural spirit from Irish folklore, on an island isolated from the world. Track the creature by listening to its distant cries and loud screams, prepare your weapon and kill it, before it reaches you.

name: Croak Croak On The Sea
description: A frog trapped alone on an uninhabited island in the middle of the sea. One day, a suspicious head comes flying there. And a dear friend of the missing frog. A frog holding a rusty axe in his hand for the first time in a long time. Can the frog find a friend?

name: Lemonade Apocalypse
description: Lead the world to apocalyse with lemonades! Price affects demand, but take into account the cost of each lemonade when selling. Upgrades reduce cost and increase demand. Invest in a factory, and eventually control the politics of the world to increase climate's temperature and beverage consumption.

name: From The Night
description: Make your way through this retro world, by dodging traps to get from the start door to the end door.

name: 15th Floor
description: You are stuck in an apartment building with endless floors. Observe your surroundings carefully to go up to the 15th floor and reach the roof of the apartment building. Do not ignore any abnormalities. Your carelessness could result in death.

name: Center Station Simulator
description: Inherit an abandoned shopping center. Make it functional and produce many products yourself in your underground laboratory! Get rich by selling them to your customers. Develop and expand your center with many features!

name: To The Flame
description: You’re a moth on a brutal pilgrimage to meet god. Jump carefully: every chasm is a chance to fall right back to the beginning. When you see the spider, hide. It can hear your little footsteps.

name: 1080p
description: 1080p is a casual shooter with roguelike elements. Join new pixels, combine guns, and find upgrades.Destroy all bugs and restore the quality to original 1080p.

name: Slimes are the Strongest
description: You're just a slime and everyone will win against you in a battle? Don't worry, multiply and increase the numbers of yourself and overcome everything in your path! Use your brains to become stronger than anyone ever imagined a slime could be. Are you ready to multiply?

name: Silent Breath
description: Silent Breath is a horror experience powered by Unreal Engine 5. Featuring photorealistic graphics, fully dynamic scares and microphone detection.

name: Hydroneer: Journey to Volcalidus
description: Sail across the sea to Volcalidus, where a new adventure awaits. This expansion delivers new mechanics to the game to aid you in your mining expedition - from huge new vehicles, to interesting new progression systems.

name: Spy Guy Hidden Objects: Deluxe Edition
description: Venture out on a colorful and hand-drawn adventure with Spy Guy! Travel between cities in search of clues and don't let the bad guys get away with the treasures! Will you manage to find them all? Explore the detective world of the bravest Treflik the detective and help him save Treflik City.

name: Lakesider: Above and Below
description: Working class weeb Knox's life is forever disturbed after a cute fish girl saves him from drowning himself by accident, introducing him to a strange sunken town hidden beneath the lake. An at times (un)comfortable slice of life turned survival horror you won't want to miss!

name: Cat Billiards
description: This is a simple casual game, bring home cats by playing billiards, the cats you bring home can be clicked with the mouse to make cute sounds, will you be able to collect all 50 cats?

name: Kudzu
description: Zoen, a master gardener and your mentor, has wandered into the fast-growing kudzu field and mysteriously disappeared. It is up to you and your arsenal of gardening tools - such as a rake, hoe, and machete - to hack your way through the overgrowth and bring Zoen back.

name: Red Nose Guy Suika
description: Red Nose Guy Suika is the latest addition to the Suika series. In this casual game, strategically merge balls to achieve the highest score. Challenge friends on the Steam leaderboard and immerse yourself in an entertaining gaming experience that combines fun and strategy!

name: Ycom
description: Have you ever wondered what is it like to be a elite snowballer? Well look no further Ycom is game for you.

name: Mutant Boxing League
description: Box against fantasy creatures in open environments. Exercise while having fun!

name: Gestalt: The Fifth Day
description: Wickeina 'Wicke' Gestalt lives in a haunted house. Trying to balance the stresses of life with the horrors of her home, play through a point-and-click psychological horror and multiple scenarios, where success and failure both progress the narrative of her story.

name: Pseudo-Haunting
description: Fend off spirits by ripping your spirit off your body. Explore a glitched haunted house. Recall twisted memories. Get out alive.

name: Sausage vs. Vegetable
description: Sausage vs. Vegetable is a run-based roguelike with bullet heaven elements, following a band of outcast sausages to level up, loot, and fight their way to uncover the truths behind the vegetable invasion.

name: Though the Heavens Fall
description: Though the Heavens Fall is a Christian game reminiscent of classic JRPG gameplay while presenting a perspective of the spiritual world using the Christian Mythos. One where God reigns supreme and though there is conflict in heavenly places, His will is imminent and unstoppable. The game while light-hearted and comedic in tone is backed by the reality that things in the spirit realm are real, our prayers have effect, and that no lesser principality will have its way forever.

name: Fate and Life: The Mystery of Vaulinhorn
description: Fate and Life: The Mystery of Vaulinhorn is a visual novel game set in an enigmatic city rife with mystery and lust. Navigate the intertwining paths of fate and desire, unearth the haunting secrets of Vaulinhorn, and revel in the thrill of its sensual encounters.

name: Victory at Sea Atlantic
description: "Victory at Sea Atlantic" transports you to the cold, unforgiving waters of the Atlantic Theatre in WWII. With a vast array of ships, planes, and subs, engage in epic sea battles & secure your place in history. Victory At Sea Atlantic is the ultimate naval warfare experience.

name: Cosmantic Cluster
description: A match 3 puzzle game with a twist! Use 8 different abilities to pursue 1 of 5 different win conditions! Out match and strategize your opponents in best of 3 rounds! Using a wide array of mechanics at your disposal! Dive into this world of magic and space to uncover the hidden origins of the world.

name: Rise of Koreth
description: Uncover the mysteries of Koreth's resting place in this exciting hack n slash, dungeon crawler, platformer adventure.

name: Inside the Labs
description: Inside the Labs is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. News of possible failed human experiments within an abandoned lab has piqued your curiosity. Uncover evidence and identify the mutation whilst avoiding the darkness that no longer trusts humans.

name: Backroom
description: Based on Alice in Borderland, SCP-096 and The Backrooms Saga. Explore, think, interact, fight, but be careful, SCP-096 could be hidden anywhere...

name: Evorevo
description: Biodiversity breeds beauty and conflict. On Earth, on the next planet. This is a story of longing and deep thinking for coexistence. and the planet on which this story unfolds... an overturned new century RPG, Evorevo.

name: The Outsider TD
description: In this new take on the classic Tower Defense style game you take on the role of Danny who must protect stash houses against waves of rival gangs seeking to destroy them. The towers are you're crew members to place strategically on the map, each of which have a unique weapons & upgrade options.

name: Katana Arena
description: Slice your enemies in different gory arenas by yourself or with your friends. Earn battle points and use them to upgrade your skills and looks.

name: Biomorph
description:
Become Your Enemy in Biomorph, a 2D Dark Metroidvania!

When you defeat a monster, the BIOMORPH mechanic allows you to take its shape and power. But beware - biomorphing has a cost as these creatures will now unlock new skills and will use them on the player upon encountering them again!

name: Our Wonderland
description: A horror-fantasy visual novel about five childhood friends returning to the wish-granting wonderland of their youth.

name: BMX Streets
description: Ready to hit the streets? BMX Streets brings the essence of street riding to your fingertips. Experience the next generation of BMX gaming with realistic physics, meaningful customization and a massive open world. Practice, experiment and explore to find your own unique style and master the streets.

name: Dice Kingdoms
description: Dice Kingdoms is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game where resource collection is based on dice. Build efficiently to quickly expand your kingdom. Roll dice to gather resources while risking natural disasters. Accumulate army and/or culture to achieve victory!

name: Sons of Valhalla
description: Sons of Valhalla is a side scrolling base building strategy game that catapults you into the age of the Vikings. You slip into the role of the Viking Jarl son Thorald Olavson, who is leaving for England to save the love of his life.

name: Double-Dabble
description: You get 5 tries to guess the secret word. The 26 letters of the English alphabet are randomly paired, and you can only guess pairs of letters. Letters in your guess are: green if either bound letter is in the right place; yellow if either bound letter is in the word somewhere else; or grey if neither bound letter is in the word.

name: Brawl Stars: Ragnarok
description: Sin descripción

name: Total Supremacy
description:
Tap, Conquer, Repeat: Command Armies, Shape Economies, Rule the World!

World domination – it's closer than you think! Total Supremacy puts you in charge to conquer the world. Gear up for thrilling 3D battles, real-time decisions, and a whole lot of strategizing as you try to outwit the globe.

Go ahead, customize your ultimate fighting force! Tanks, infantry, heavy-duty vehicles... deploy them all for spectacular combat that brings your strategies to life. The battlefield is always changing, so adjust your tactics on the fly and leave your enemies in the dust.

Remember, making friends (and crushing them later) is the name of the game! Build alliances, coordinate plans, and then scheme together for a total global takeover. In the world of Total Supremacy, diplomacy is your secret weapon... wield it wisely!

name: The Secret Behind the Exam Paper

Swipe to feed condos to monsters. Match the correct colors together and create combos to pull off insane score streaks. Feed the wrong condos to the wrong monster too many times and they will topple over your tower.

This is a version of the Super Monsters Ate My Condo remake exclusively for Apple Arcade. The microtransactions have been removed, but it requires a subscription to play.

description: A flappy bird-style game, but you're a whale who has to deal with being pulled both up and down.

name: Suffocation
description:
Best Friends love eachother. Best Friends care about eachother, look out for one another. Best Friends never go anywhere without eachother.

Best Friends should never lie to one another. Best Friends should never fight with eachother, make eachother jealous. Best Friends love eachother.

That's what he thinks, anyway. He's your Best Friend. Nothing more or less.

"Exvania" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1992.
The objective is to explode the orb, defeat other rivals, and rescue Princess Electra who is stuck in the final stage.
Break the treasure chests and take the items that come out to strengthen yourself and give yourself a leg up on your rivals.

Let's find out how you control the 12th largest airport in Tower! Sim 3.

Art Heist, Sotano, Vereda, Alumni and Subnet.

If something unusual happens, go back to the opposite passage!
Find the rules from the repeating subway and escape!

description: There is a shrine called the Conception Shrine. It is said that women who come here will be able to conceive as long as they worship the abbot. Therefore, this shrine is famous and popular with a large number of childless women.

description: Embark on an epic journey into the heart of the Wild West with "Deadrock Redemption," an open-world RPG that seamlessly blends captivating storytelling, deep character interactions, and an expansive 3D world waiting to be explored.

description: Introducing the Mad Viking Games: VR Experience. Immerse yourself in an all-round experience of the Viking life. Not only will you be able to grab any sort of weapon or shield, but you will also have the ability to roam the hall of the races.

description: SteamWorld Build Mechanized DLC introduces you to your new best friend, The Mech! Explore and manage new mines and solve more puzzles with your new not so little buddy. But be ready to construct your defences to beat the Abominations!

It's time for a street-food-making challenge: ikayaki!
Make as many as you can and watch your food cart prosper!

description: Erogods: Mirage is a dating simulator with feminized Egyptian gods.

name: Smuta
description: Smuta is a third-person action/RPG computer game developed by the Russian game studio Cyberia Nova.

name: Swarm Fortress
description: Build walls, turrets and summon allies to survive hordes of enemies in this top-down sandbox base builder.

name: Deadland Chronicles
description: Deadland Chronicles promises endless hours of excitement and challenge.

name: Tarlis World
description: "Tarlis World" is game where you rule the world with your own tactic or strategy to achieve your goals!

name: Real-Gostop VR
description: The VR Go-Stop game transcends a mere card game, transforming you into a time traveler through a portal. Based on the rules of traditional Korean Go-Stop, this game offers a new dimension of experience by blending tradition and modernity through cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

name: Purpose 1951
description: "Purpose 1951" is an almost pure walking simulator set in the United States of 1951. You play as a retired doctor whose life falls apart.

name: Horror of Victim
description: Psychological horror about a girl captured by an insane family.

name: Glitch Maze.exe
description: In this fast-paced arcade game, inspired by Pac-Man, you navigate through a dark maze, chasing the highest score. Avoid the lurking dangers, find secrets and game-changing power-ups as you explore the maze. And remember, even your failures can illuminate your path through the darkness.

name: WWII Airplane Fight: Battle War Squad
description: Dominate the skies, Conquer the seas, Rewrite wartime history.

name: Beyond Terra
description: Beyond Terra is an computer game that transports player into a world where they can build cities in Earth's orbit and explore the mysteries of the Moon. In this game, player take on the role of space pioneers aiming to colonize space and establish a thriving civilization in Earth's orbit.

name: Korean Rail Driving Tour: LRT Uijeongbu
description: This game is a railroad simulation game that allows you to experience actual railroad operation based on video footage of the driving direction of an actual train. Get feeling of being a train driver just by operating the accelerator and brakes. Enjoy “real” video of S.Korea’s beautiful scenery!

name: Backrooms: Meg Archives
description: Backrooms:MEG Archives is a single-player horror exploration game. Experience the hidden layers of the MEG archive, explore that dusty story in danger, and witness the hierarchical adventures of the explorer's predecessors.

name: Etherrealm
description: A rogue dungeon crawler with fast-paced live combat mechanics that are reminiscent of the classic souls-like game.

name: Parkour Every Day
description: A side-scrolling parkour game with a high level of difficulty.

name: Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons - Sacred Reunion
description: Sin descripción

name: Nora Wanna Rise
description: "Nora Wanna Rise" is a parkour game where players guide Nora through castles, cities, and a space station. Mastering agility and strategy, they face unique challenges in each setting. It's a blend of adventure and skill, captivating players with its dynamic gameplay.

name: Apartment of Death
description: Venture into the abandoned jungle apartment, embody lone survivor Ross, on a gripping adventure. College friends Joanna and Ivan went missing here. You must unravel mysteries room-by-room while evading a lurking killer's attacks. Can you pierce the enigmas and escape unscathed?

name: I Will Make You Scared of This Red Box.
description: The Red Cube wants to eat all of the pills in the hospital. The problem is that he has already had WAY too many! You need to collect all of the the pills in the facility so that he doesn't eat any more. Be careful though...The Cube REALLY likes his pills...

name: I Am Kilt
description: I Am Kilt is a twin-stick shooter roguelite where you fend off endless hordes of enemies. Combine upgrades to overwhelm the opposition and dominate the field. Do you have the forethought and skill to survive?

name: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop
description: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop! For ios

name: Sugar Tanks 2
description: This is an intense, fast-paced, and super-sweet tank shooter game. Defend your sweet home world from evil grey tanks, trying to sap all the color from it.

name: Reign of Guilds: Black Knight
description: Continue your journey with this pack unlocking additional exclusive in-game content!

name: Nasty Zombies
description: Blast through hordes of Nasty Zombies solo or with up to 3 friends! Face dynamic map layouts, ensuring every run is unique. Unlock perks and power-ups with your hard-earned cash in this wave-based, retro-inspired shooter.

name: The Ten Soul
description: As time passes, waves of stronger and stronger monsters will attack, with nowhere to run and the need to defend the crystals behind you, which give some ability to kill the monsters to improve your own attributes, or you can sign a contract with them to fight alongside you.

name: Reign of Guilds: Raubritter
description: Continue your journey with this pack unlocking additional exclusive in-game content!

name: Reign of Guilds: Banneret
description: Continue your journey with this pack unlocking additional exclusive in-game content!

name: Cubon
description: Cubon is a casual platform and puzzle game where you have to find your place in the world. Jump, open doors, and find your way through each level. But watch out! Everywhere you go, you'll leave a trace behind you, making it impossible for you to go back to the same place again.

name: Tomboy: Sex in the Forest
description: You are an ordinary programmer John. Your life revolves entirely around computers, but today, your favorite tomboy invites you to spend a weekend outdoors with her. How lucky?!

name: Taxi Driver Life VR
description: Experience the thrill of real taxi driving in Taxi Life! Navigate through city streets, encounter diverse customers and tackle various tasks as you manage your taxi.With realistic graphics, dynamic weather and detailed vehicle controls, immerse yourself in the world of taxi driving like never before

name: Backrooms: The Exit
description: Backrooms: The Exit is a single-player adventure game based on theme of backrooms.Inside the game you will need to avoid all threatening entities and find the cutscenes (exits) for each level, and perhaps many unexpected ways out of a level.

name: Retro Mystery Club Vol.2: The Beppu Case
description: The stage is set in Beppu, Oita Prefecture, for the latest installment in this retro mystery series! There, hearts that pass each other by can’t help but grow twisted… Uncover the truth behind a mysterious death with your junior detective, Ken!

name: The Otter Ways
description: Humans left this place long ago. Now you, an inquisitive otter, must survive there, among the ruins of their kingdoms.

name: Construction Simulator: Gold Edition
description: The Gold Edition of Construction Simulator offers an all-inclusive experience for aspiring construction entrepreneurs. This comprehensive bundle includes the base game, which already boasts over 100 construction contracts and a selection of more than 90 construction machines from 24 licensed manufacturers. But that's not all - the Gold Edition comes packed with additional content released prior to this version.

name: AiPri Verse
description: AiPri Verse is one of two rhythm-based amusement arcade game releasing alongside the Himitsu no AiPri anime series. It features characters from all across the Pretty Series franchise of anime and games.

name: Himitsu no AiPri
description: Himitsu no AiPri is one of two rhythm-based amusement arcade game releasing alongside the anime series of the same name.

name: Brutal Ball
description: Brutal Ball is a retro-styled shooter-sport hybrid where players can kill each other with gauntlet weapons or giant controllable spiked balls of destruction. Players strive to work together and dominate a match scoring goal after brutal goal.

name: Colony Defense: The Ultimate Minimalist Tower Base Defense Game
description: The Ultimate Highly Addictive Minimalist Tower Base Defense Game.

name: Homeland
description: The ancient Darkness has awakened, a black abyss of madness opened up in the mythical and real world.. Our protagonist's girlfriend has been kidnapped by strangers without reason, why they did this? You need to deal with this creatures!

name: Bear Jojo
description: Embark on a whimsical adventure with Bear JoJo in this all-ages arcade game. Enjoy challenging gameplay and discover enchanting surprises along the way!

name: Tiny Balls
description: Tiny Balls is a multiplayer party game in which up to 16 friends can play against each other. In the three modes, players control a marble and must either push their friends off the track in a heated race, play a game of tag, or be the last to survive on a platform by pushing their friends off.

name: Homeland
description: The ancient Darkness has awakened, a black abyss of madness opened up in the mythical and real world.. Our protagonist's girlfriend has been kidnapped by strangers without reason, why they did this? You need to deal with this creatures!

name: Bug Heroes: Tower Defense
description: Help the Bug Heroes defend their food stash from hordes of enemies! Control powerful heroes, build your defenses, level up your heroes and towers, equip upgrades, and more!

name: Dark Age
description: Dark Age is a futuristic 3D action game with refined low poly design. Enjoy this frenetic Beat 'em up.

name: The Devilry Reservation: Сhapter II
description: The second chapter of The Devilry Reservation: Behind the Shadow - Shadow. Immerse yourself in the internal affairs of the Paranormal Security Service. Be ready to see the other side of the interaction of evil spirits with our world. How people side by side with them hold the two worlds in harmony.

name: Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors
description: A new roguelite survivor game set in the beloved fantasy world of Pathfinder. Enter Gallowspire, Pathfinder’s legendary tower of darkness, alongside your fearless companion. Slay hordes of enemies, upgrade your arsenal, and overcome deadly bosses to seal away the ancient king of undeath!

name: Beat Slayer
description: Put on your headphones, feel the beat, step into the flow and survive. Beat Slayer is all about rhythm and fighting. Pick a crazy weapon like the flamethrowing axe and turn hordes of robots into scrap metal by creating your own symphony of destruction.

name: CrashOut Xtreme
description: Crashout Xtreme is a casual arcade game with a unique combination of Pong and Brickout gameplay. Break the blocks using the bat and ball with a new and fresh design. Various gameplay experiences await with power-ups, and so the challenging enemies.

name: Dungeon Renovation Simulator
description: Dungeon Renovation Simulator offers a unique adventure where you step into the shoes of a “Cursed Goblin” cleaner and renovator in a medieval-inspired world. In this single-player simulation game, you’ll explore, clean and revive intriguing environments, each with its own set of physics-based challenges and hidden quests.

name: Knock'Em Out
description: Fight with your whole body. If you lose an arm, it's just a scratch. If you lose the other, it's a flesh wound. If you lose your legs, headbutt them. FIGHT, FIGHT, FIGHT!

name: Player Non Player
description: In this game you will explore a strange island and meet four enigmatic characters. Interact with them, tame them and uncover their dreams. Will you be able to make them come true so that they can finally rest in peace?

name: Death Noodle Delivery
description:
It's your first day of work for Death Noodle Delivery Inc. Ride your hoverboard and try to survive in a cyberpunk world on the brink of collapse. Deliver the noodles, hack the hoverboard and build cat bombs. You may find that this world hides a filthy secret.

Upgrade your old hoverboard from a rusty ironing board to a perfected killing machine. Jailbreak AI paywalls and unlock new power-ups that let you manipulate time and launch explosive cats!

Talk to your neighbours and find out their dirty stories. Browse the web for hacks and pleasure. Survive long enough, and you may discover that this world hides a terrible secret.

name: Withering Rooms
description: Withering Rooms is a 2.5D horror adventure set in a procedurally generated Victorian mansion that changes each night. Sneak through Mostyn House to gather weapons, distractions, magical artifacts, keys, and crafting materials.

name: Cartridge the Tiger
description: Cartridge the Tiger is a Super Nintendo inspired platformer with an in-game level editor, easy-to-use mod support using C#, and Steam Workshop integration.

name: Turbo Golf Racing
description: Turbo Golf Racing is an arcade-style sports racing game for up to eight players online. Drive, boost, jump, flip and fly your Turbo-powered car. Slam into oversized golf balls. Race your friends in an explosive dash to the finish flag. This is Turbo Golf Racing.

name: Britannia
description: Live over a thousand years of Britain’s early history in this epic game of conquest and rule. From the Roman conquest to the William the Conqueror’s Norman invasion, explore the destiny of many nations, and fight to become King.

name: Wizdom
description: Wizdom is a Role Playing Game、 that focuses on the world of Medieval swords and magic. Based on the Rogue-Like with 3D graphics and Active game system It provides a simple and easy-to-use operation system.

name: Runic Relay: The Trials
description: Runic Relay: The Trials is a First Person Platforming game with a focus on Speedrunning. Play as an apprentice wizard who has entered in a competition called “The Trials.” Each trial takes place in a magically constructed dungeon, and consists of a short challenge that you must complete using the tools given to you. These tools include multiple spells, which you can use in tandem with one another to complete tasks that one spell alone might not be able to.

name: Nova Island
description:
On Nova Island, experience 1v1 card battles like you never have before!

Looking for a new kind of strategy game with great characters? Nova Island has the gameplay experience for you! Take on single player challenges, play matches with friends, and compete against players from around the world to climb the leaderboards. Nova Island is free to play —start playing now to put your strategy to the test!

Play cards to gain strength, deal damage, or disrupt your opponent in a way they’ll never see coming. Choose one of 6 Pro Characters, each bringing 3 unique Superpowers to the battle.

name: Reign of Guilds
description: Reign of Guilds is a classic MMORPG. Dark magical middle ages: open world, castle sieges, economy and diplomacy, merchant and craft associations, church and mercenaries, counts and of course the King. Choose your side.

name: The Train Part 2
description: The Train Part 2 is a sequel to GnomeKing Games's first Game Boy title, The Train. It picks up immediately after where The Train ended, taking Eve and her grandad to a megacity called New Bromdal.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Whomp's Fortress
description: A mod that adds Whomp's Fortress from Super Mario 64 to the Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 3
description: Leave no friend behind: The Konni Group has left its indelible mark on Fortune’s Keep and is now occupying another landmass — the infamous Rebirth Island comes back to Call of Duty: Warzone! Rally your squad and investigate this hottest of drops at the start of Season 3. Elsewhere in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, expect one of the biggest Multiplayer map drops ever, with six new Core 6v6 maps. Also included are four free base weapons; eight Aftermarket Parts; Ranked Play (including Resurgence on Rebirth Island); the arrival of Makarov and Snoop Dogg; and two brand-new Operators to the premium Battle Pass, Banshee and Hush.

name: Bilateral!
description: A word game with a new puzzle every day.

name: Nurse Me!
description: Enjoy your time in a hospital with a sexy doctor, nurse and an idol roommate! An adult visual novel adventure with multiple endings.

name: Agujero
description: Agujero is a Deep Hole Crawler made for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2024.

name: Vespera_Hotel
description: Welcome to Vespera Hotel! Please observe the precautions on manager's letter and greet our dear guests with your smile.

name: From Four Sides
description: From Four Sides is a game in which you control a yellow square and must dodge flying spikes in four directions. Points are awarded for dodging spikes. The game ends when the spike hits you.

description: Sin descripción

description: How does an atom look like compared to a planet? How big is the Milky Way compared to other galaxies? In this simple application you have the opportunity to see and compare the real sizes of various objects in our Universe, from atoms to galaxies.

description: This game is to help the frog Kata and his friends escape from a dangerous area.

description: A simple strategy about capturing castles. Build up your forces, manage armies and capture enemy fortresses. Build buildings in castles and use strategic tricks. Capture all the fortresses to win.
